property.name: firstChatBubble
property.default: Good Morning Doctor Stark, this is Linda, I hope you are doing well today. How may I help you? I see that you had created a MIRF earlier today about Cholecap?

property.name: secondChatBubble
property.default: Hi Linda, thanks. I hope you are doing well too. That is correct. I have a patient who is pregnant and I couldn't find any on-label information regarding Cholecap during pregnancy. Can we use it off-label for pregant woman?
property.label: Second Chat Bubble Text

property.name: thirdChatBubble
property.default: Let me quickly check our Medical Database. Mhhh...yes, we have a match. So it looks like Cholecap can be prescribed to pregnant woman. Let me just send over some documentation regarding Cholecap during pregnancies. Anything else I can help with?
property.label: Third Chat Bubble Text

property.name: fourthChatBubble
property.default: Thank you Linda. That would be great. That is it already. Have a great day!
property.label: Fourth Chat Bubble Text

property.name: fifthChatBubble
property.default: You too Dr. Stark. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help with
